It's been a great game so far. Been playing since beta and it's come a long way, but could use more maps and current map reworks. Competitive play needs multiple variations of maps that are randomized when chosen. I.e. Inferno/Mirage can have multiple variations and are randomly chosen when queued.

I have been playing Counter-Strike since condition zero. You wouldn't know it by how bad I am at it, but it's been the only game that I have continued playing all these years.  It is the only game that delivers that shock of surprise feeling when you are deep in all action. The fast action keeps you on your toes and the skill level of the players are the most difficult. It's a game of team strategy, whether rushing a 'A' , trading kills, or camping bombsite, this game keeps you at the edge.
